results.title: Metformin as an Adjunct Treatment to Temozolomide for High-Grade Gliomas: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: A systematic search on PubMed, Embase, and Cochrane Library databases was conducted for studies comparing @CHEMICAL_Temozolomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077204 @@@TMZ@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ vs. @CHEMICAL_Temozolomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077204 @@@TMZ@@@ alone for @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@HGG@@@.

Metformin as an Adjunct Treatment to Temozolomide for High-Grade Gliomas: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis. World Neurosurg. 2025 Feb 27;():123842. PMID: 40023279

results.title: Diabetes, metformin use and risk of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma in postmenopausal women: A prospective cohort analysis in the Women's Health Initiative.
results.text_hl: Epidemiologic evidence is limited about associations between T2DM, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@non-Hodgkin's lymphoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@NHL@@@).

results.title: Nanocarrier-Assisted Delivery of Metformin Boosts Remodeling of Diabetic Periodontal Tissue via Cellular Exocytosis-Mediated Regulation of Endoplasmic Reticulum Homeostasis.
results.text_hl: Recent studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can modulate @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@ER dysfunction@@@, yet its mechanism remains unclear.

results.title: Combination of Scutellaria baicalensis and Metformin Ameliorates Diet-Induced Metabolic Dysregulation in Mice via the Gut-Liver-Brain Axis.
results.text_hl: Our findings indicate that SB and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ co-treatment is an effective therapeutic approach for @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@HFFD@@@-induced @DISEASE_Chronobiology_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D021081 @@@metabolic dysregulation@@@ which is operated through the gut-liver-brain axis.

results.title: [Metformin mitigates doxorubicin-induced cardiotoxicity via the AMPK pathway].
results.journal: Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao
results.text_hl: METHODS: We analyzed the data of 123 patients with @DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid @DISEASE_MESH:D007951 @@@myeloid leukemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@non-Hodgkin's lymphoma@@@, or @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ receiving @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ for phased chemotherapy, including 43 patients receiving combined treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (test group) and 80 without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (control group).

results.title: Metformin is associated with a lower risk of non-Hodgkin lymphoma in patients with type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: ...BACKGROUND: Whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use might affect the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@non-Hodgkin lymphoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@NHL@@@) remained to be answered.

results.title: Chronic Low-grade Inflammatory Phenotype (CLIP) and Senescent Immune Dysregulation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@ have anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ property and may serve as a promising therapeutic agent for treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@CLIP@@@ and @DISEASE_Frailty @DISEASE_MESH:D000073496 @@@frailty@@@.

results.title: Metformin and melatonin improve histopathological outcome of NMU-induced mammary tumors in rats.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Although neither @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ incidence nor frequency were changed after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ and/or @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@MEL@@@ administration, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@MEL@@@ decreased high-grade/low-grade (@<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@HG/LG) tumor@@@ ratio.

results.title: Use of statins offsets insulin-related cancer risk.
results.text_hl: The strongest effects were observed for use of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@pancreatic cancer@@@ [m: OR 4.5, 95% CI: 3.1-6.6; females (f): OR 4.2, 95% CI: 2.5-7.1], @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@ (m: OR 2.8, 95% CI: 1.7-4.6; f: OR 3.0, 95% CI: 2.1-4.2) or @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@glitazones@@@ and @DISEASE_Skin_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D012878 @@@skin cancer@@@ (f: OR 0.54, 95% CI: 0.36-0.80), as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@cancer of the prostate@@@ (m: OR 0.82, 95% CI: 0.75-0.91) and corpus uteri (f: OR 1.7, 95% CI: 1.4-2.0) and @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@non-Hodgkin's lymphoma@@@ (f: OR 0.76, 95% CI: 0.64-0.91).

citations.NLM: Kautzky-Willer A, Thurner S, Klimek P. Use of statins offsets insulin-related cancer risk. J Intern Med. 2017 Feb;281(2):206-216. PMID: 27766700
